model

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Product

  • public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the class "Product" linked to the table "product" in the ordermng.db database.
    Since:
    Apr 06, 2020
    Author:
    Coroian Tudor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int deleted
      Flag to show if the product should be treated as deleted.
      private int id_product
      The id of the product stored in the database.
      private double price
      The price of the product stored in the database.
      private java.lang.String prod_name
      The name of the product stored in the database.
      private int quantity
      The quantity of the product stored in the database.

    • Field Detail

      • id_product

        private int id_product
        The id of the product stored in the database. Must be unique.

      • prod_name

        private java.lang.String prod_name
        The name of the product stored in the database. Must be unique.

      • quantity

        private int quantity
        The quantity of the product stored in the database. Must be greater or equal to zero.

      • price

        private double price
        The price of the product stored in the database. Must be greater than zero.

      • deleted

        private int deleted
        Flag to show if the product should be treated as deleted.
